subject: Insurance
Basketball (College)
Disability Insurance
College Athletics
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: Nerlens Noel, projected by some to be the N.B.A.’s top draft choice this year, tore a knee ligament Tuesday and helped renew debate over limitations on college athletes’ insuring themselves.
snippet: Nerlens Noel, projected by some to be the N.B.A.’s top draft choice this year, tore a knee ligament Tuesday and helped renew debate over limitations on college athletes’ insuring themselves.
